title: GPU load is about 30% and getting FPS lag
body: my gpu load for overwatch 99% and I get the frame rates that I expect. But for months now, I have been getting FPS lag in league and my gpu only being around 30%. I used to get 200+fps constantly on my 960. Now with the 1070. starts 450 and that is at 50% then flats out to 20-30%ish load then bounce up and down from 90-200, causing fps lag. no, it didn't start right after I got the 1070. Nothing wrong with anything on the FPS issue guideline because I have done all of that before posting plus it only affect this game.

replies.body: Have you tried rolling back to an earlier driver version? If so, which driver versions have you already tested out?
